rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equipped creature has protection from nonwhite as long as it's tapped. [i](This permanent can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything nonwhite as long as it's tapped.)[/i]
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, exile target nonland permanent that player controls.
Equip {2}{W}
